about_the_game:
Portugal Tourism GP! is an isometric platformer pixel art game that takes players on a tour through Portugal's most iconic locations. Players assume the role of quirky European stereotypes, racing through vibrant, handcrafted pixel-art environments inspired by real-world landmarks.

In each level, players must navigate unique challenges and objectives, such as tasting local cuisine, visiting famous attractions, and keeping their budget in check. The goal is to experience everything each destination has to offer while spending as little money as possible.

The game features:

  • A variety of levels inspired by Portugal's most visited destinations, including Lisbon (Bairro Alto), Porto (Cais da Ribeira) and Algarve (Praia da Rocha)

  • Unlockable characters representing humorous European stereotypes, each with unique abilities.

  • A progression system that rewards high scores with new maps and content.

  • Charming pixel art celebrating Portuguese culture.

  • Online leadersboards for competition and bragging rights.

Whether you're competing for the top score or exploring each destination's quirks, Portugal Tourism GP! offers a fun and lighthearted way to experience Portugal."
detailed_description:
Portugal Tourism GP! is an isometric platformer pixel art game that takes players on a tour through Portugal's most iconic locations. Players assume the role of quirky European stereotypes, racing through vibrant, handcrafted pixel-art environments inspired by real-world landmarks.

In each level, players must navigate unique challenges and objectives, such as tasting local cuisine, visiting famous attractions, and keeping their budget in check. The goal is to experience everything each destination has to offer while spending as little money as possible.

The game features:

  • A variety of levels inspired by Portugal's most visited destinations, including Lisbon (Bairro Alto), Porto (Cais da Ribeira) and Algarve (Praia da Rocha)

  • Unlockable characters representing humorous European stereotypes, each with unique abilities.

  • A progression system that rewards high scores with new maps and content.

  • Charming pixel art celebrating Portuguese culture.

  • Online leadersboards for competition and bragging rights.

Whether you're competing for the top score or exploring each destination's quirks, Portugal Tourism GP! offers a fun and lighthearted way to experience Portugal."

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 23.03 or SteamOS 1.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100T
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ventura 13.0
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Portugal Tourism GP!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100T
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Be a tourist and visit the most iconic Portugal locations such as Bairro Alto or Praia da Rocha!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Portugal*
*languages with full audio support
